content: I'll definitely ask the park staff about their sustainability initiatives and conservation efforts when I'm there. It's great to know that there are organizations and initiatives working towards making theme parks more environmentally friendly. By the way, I've been thinking about my experience at the Disneyland Resort's VoluntEARS event, where we packed and sorted food boxes at the Anaheim Food Bank. I was wondering if you know of any organizations that focus on reducing food waste or hunger in local communities?
